thread.title: LinkedIn pilot project targets S.F. ‘gig economy’ freelancers
thread.title_full: LinkedIn pilot project targets S.F. ‘gig economy’ freelancers - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Benny Evangelista
title: LinkedIn pilot project targets S.F. ‘gig economy’ freelancers
text:
This screenshot shows one page of LinkedIn’s new pilot ProFinder service, which matches employers looking for freelance or contract workers with those freelancers and independent contractors who could best fit the bill. ProFinder launches as a test in the San Francisco Bay Area, listing jobs for professional accountants, graphic designers and writers/editors. This screenshot shows one page of LinkedIn’s new pilot ProFinder...
LinkedIn launched a pilot project Monday aimed at the growing number of American freelancers and contractors. This screenshot shows one page of LinkedIn’s new pilot ProFinder service, which matches employers looking for freelance or contract workers with those freelancers and independent contractors who could best fit the bill. ProFinder launches as a test in the San Francisco Bay Area, listing jobs for professional accountants, graphic designers and writers/editors. This screenshot shows one page of LinkedIn’s new pilot ProFinder...
LinkedIn launched a pilot project Monday aimed at the growing number of American freelancers and contractors.
